action_details: Based on the high-severity electrical fire incident, I prioritized hospitals based on their specializations and available bed capacity. Hospital Quir贸nsalud Campo de Gibraltar received three votes due to its Burn Unit specialization, which is crucial for treating burn injuries. Hospital Universitario Puerta del Mar received two votes as it has a Trauma specialty and sufficient available bed capacity. Hospital Pascual San Rafael also received one vote due to its Burn Unit and Trauma specialties, although it has a lower available bed capacity compared to the top-ranked hospitals. Hospital Dr L贸pez Cano did not receive any votes as it lacks the necessary specializations for treating high-severity electrical fire injuries.
